For more practice and review,

you can also check out the following resources:

  • Khan Academy Statistics and Probability for extra practice and review.
  • Khan Academy Pre-Calculus for extra practice and review.
  • Khan Academy Calculus AP AB for extra practice and review.
  • 3Blue1Brown Website for visual explanations of math concepts including calculus and probability.
  • MIT OpenCourseWare 18.05 for a more rigorous approach to probability and statistics given by MIT professors.
  • Professor Leonard's YouTube Channel for videos on calculus concepts.
  • Flipped Math for more practice and review of calculus.
